content: अनुसरणं {@--1@} Following, pursuing, going after, seeking after; क्रंदनानुसरणं क्रियतां <ls>H. 3</ls>; कनकसूत्र° प्रवृत्तै राजपुरुषैः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Conformity to, accordance with, consequence of (in <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>); इंदोस्त्वदनुसरणक्लिष्टकांतेः <ls>Me. 84.</ls> {@--3@} Custom, usage, habit.
